data.message: Get rid of David Leavitt, he's sick and an embarrassment making jokes about the victims of the Manchester terror attack.

replies.message: Hi Steve, we do not condone his insensitive comments and we have ensured he will no longer represent our brands.

Coca-Cola That's excellent news, I applaud your common sense, sensitivity and compassion with respect to all of the victims of the senseless attack.

Kind Regards

Hi coca cola I'm loving my bottle of coke that says cape town on it. And I love the taste of coke. I'm keeping my bottle of coke that I finished as I love it saying cape town. Keeping it as a souvenir. I saw the word new York I've been to new York its awesome over there. And as for london. I'm already in london. Well I'm enjoying my cola. I'm going to show my friend my bottle of coke saying cape town on it.
